org.cast.cwm.components.service
Class JavascriptService

java.lang.Object
  org.cast.cwm.components.service.JavascriptService

public class JavascriptService
extends Object

This class centralizes inclusions of JQuery and other Javascript libraries that we may commonly use. At the moment it is very simple-minded, but may eventually be more clever about using CDNs, including multiple versions, fallbacks etc.

includeJQuery

                          String version)
Add appropriate markup to the header to include the specified version of JQuery.

Parameters:
response -
version - the version string, or null to use the default version.

getJQueryResourceReference

protected org.apache.wicket.ResourceReference getJQueryResourceReference()
Return a reference to a local copy of the current version of JQuery that we are using.

Returns:
a ResourceReference for the library

getJQueryResourceReference

protected org.apache.wicket.ResourceReference getJQueryResourceReference(String version)
Return a reference to a local copy of the specified version of JQuery. This method just assumes that the caller will only ask for versions that are actually locally stored in this module.

Parameters:
version - a version string, or null to use the default version.
Returns:
a ResourceReference for the library

setUseCDN

public void setUseCDN(boolean useCDN)

Tell this class whether you want to load javascript libraries from a CDN or from local files.

Note: Changing this behavior between multiple calls of includeJQuery(IHeaderResponse) on a page (e.g. from different components) can lead to problems.

Parameters:
useCDN - true to use a CDN (true is the default)

isUseCDN

public boolean isUseCDN()
